responses.rationale: Factual report of a quote describing an economic trade-off ('really bad deal') without explicit framing cues about the disease threat itself.

Reports a potential public reaction ('fear attention', 'inflame anti-immigrant fervor') which falls under the psychological verb context guard. No explicit framing cues about the disease threat itself.
